sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* [ApprStat_SqlMap.xml] getTimeStatList */
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, 0 cnt2, 0 time2, 0 cnt3, 0 time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, 0 cnt3, 0 time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, NVL(SUM(time11),0) time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, NVL(SUM(time11),0) time11, NVL(SUM(cnt12),0) cnt12, NVL(SUM(time12),0) time12,
NVL(SUM(cntSum),0) cntSum, NVL(SUM(timeSum),0) timeSum, b.GROUP_ID groupId, b.GROUP_NAME groupName FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym1# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt1, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym1# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time1,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym2# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt2, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym2# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time2,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym3# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt3, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym3# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time3,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym4# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt4, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym4# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time4,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym5# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt5, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym5# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time5,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym6# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt6, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym6# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time6,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym7# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt7, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym7# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time7,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym8# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt8, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym8# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time8,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym9# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt9, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym9# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time9,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym10# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt10, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym10# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time10,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym11# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt11, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym11# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time11,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym12# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt12, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym12# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time12,
SUM(doc_cnt) cntSum, SUM(doc_lead_time) timeSum, group_id FROM IKEP4_APPR_DOC_STATS WHERE stats_date BETWEEN TO_DATE (#searchStartDate#) AND TO_DATE (#searchEndDate#)
AND parent_group_id = #searchGroupId#
GROUP BY group_id, group_name, TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm')) a RIGHT JOIN ikep4_ev_group b ON a.GROUP_ID = b.GROUP_ID WHERE b.parent_group_id = #searchGroupId# AND b.group_type_id = 'G0001' GROUP BY b.GROUP_ID, b.GROUP_NAME
ORDER BY
b.group_name
cntSum
timeSum
DESC
ASC

SELECT /* [ApprStat_SqlMap.xml] getUserStatList */ * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, 0 cnt2, 0 time2, 0 cnt3, 0 time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, 0 cnt3, 0 time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, 0 cnt4, 0 time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, 0 cnt5, 0 time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, 0 cnt6, 0 time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, 0 cnt7, 0 time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, 0 cnt8, 0 time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, 0 cnt9, 0 time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, 0 cnt10, 0 time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, 0 cnt11, 0 time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, NVL(SUM(time11),0) time11, 0 cnt12, 0 time12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(time1),0) time1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(time2),0) time2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(time3),0) time3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(time4),0) time4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(time5),0) time5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(time6),0) time6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(time7),0) time7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(time8),0) time8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(time9),0) time9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(time10),0) time10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, NVL(SUM(time11),0) time11, NVL(SUM(cnt12),0) cnt12, NVL(SUM(time12),0) time12,
NVL(SUM(cntSum),0) cntSum, NVL(SUM(timeSum),0) timeSum, user_id approverId, user_name approverName FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym1# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt1, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym1# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time1,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym2# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt2, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym2# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time2,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym3# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt3, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym3# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time3,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym4# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt4, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym4# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time4,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym5# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt5, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym5# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time5,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym6# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt6, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym6# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time6,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym7# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt7, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym7# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time7,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym8# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt8, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym8# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time8,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym9# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt9, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym9# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time9,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym10# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt10, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym10# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time10,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym11# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt11, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym11# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time11,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym12# THEN SUM (doc_cnt) END cnt12, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym12# THEN SUM (doc_lead_time) END time12,
SUM(doc_cnt) cntSum, SUM(doc_lead_time) timeSum, user_id, user_name FROM IKEP4_APPR_USER_STATS WHERE stats_date BETWEEN TO_DATE (#searchStartDate#) AND TO_DATE (#searchEndDate#)
AND UPPER(user_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchApprTitle#) || '%'
GROUP BY user_id, user_name, TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm')) GROUP BY user_id, user_name
ORDER BY
user_name
cntSum
timeSum
DESC
ASC
/* ===========================================END */
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT /* [ApprStat_SqlMap.xml] getUserStatCount */ count(*) FROM ( SELECT user_id, user_name FROM ( SELECT user_id, user_name FROM IKEP4_APPR_USER_STATS WHERE stats_date BETWEEN TO_DATE (#searchStartDate#) AND TO_DATE (#searchEndDate#)
AND UPPER(user_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchApprTitle#) || '%'
GROUP BY user_id, user_name, TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm')) GROUP BY user_id, user_name)

/* [ApprStat_SqlMap.xml] getFormStatList */ SELECT NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, 0 cnt2, 0 cnt3, 0 cnt4, 0 cnt5, 0 cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, 0 cnt3, 0 cnt4, 0 cnt5, 0 cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, 0 cnt4, 0 cnt5, 0 cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, 0 cnt5, 0 cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, 0 cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, 0 cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, 0 cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, 0 cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, 0 cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, 0 cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, 0 cnt12,
NVL(SUM(cnt1),0) cnt1, NVL(SUM(cnt2),0) cnt2, NVL(SUM(cnt3),0) cnt3, NVL(SUM(cnt4),0) cnt4, NVL(SUM(cnt5),0) cnt5, NVL(SUM(cnt6),0) cnt6, NVL(SUM(cnt7),0) cnt7, NVL(SUM(cnt8),0) cnt8, NVL(SUM(cnt9),0) cnt9, NVL(SUM(cnt10),0) cnt10, NVL(SUM(cnt11),0) cnt11, NVL(SUM(cnt12),0) cnt12,
SUM(NVL(totSum,0)) totSum, AF.form_id formId, AF.form_name formName FROM IKEP4_APPR_FORM AF LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym1# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt1,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym2# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt2,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym3# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt3,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym4# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt4,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym5# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt5,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym6# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt6,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym7# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt7,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym8# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt8,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym9# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt9,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym10# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt10,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym11# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt11,
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') = #ym12# THEN SUM (form_cnt) END cnt12,
SUM(form_cnt) totSum, AF.form_id, AF.form_name FROM IKEP4_APPR_FORM_STATS AFS INNER JOIN IKEP4_APPR_FORM AF ON AFS.FORM_ID = AF.FORM_ID WHERE AFS.stats_date BETWEEN TO_DATE (#searchStartDate#) AND TO_DATE (#searchEndDate#) GROUP BY AF.form_id, AF.form_name, TO_CHAR (stats_date, 'yyyy-mm') ) A ON AF.form_id = A.form_id WHERE AF.FORM_PARENT_ID IN ( SELECT CODE_ID FROM IKEP4_APPR_CODE WHERE USAGE = '1' START WITH CODE_ID = #formParentId# CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_ID = PARENT_CODE_ID ) GROUP BY AF.form_name,AF.form_id ORDER BY totSum DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IKEP4_APPR_DOC_STATS (DOC_STATS_ID, DOC_STATS_TYPE, PORTAL_ID, GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, PARENT_GROUP_ID, GROUP_TYPE, DOC_CNT, DOC_LEAD_TIME, STATS_DATE, REGIST_DATE) SELECT SEQ_IKEP4.NEXTVAL, '0', portal_id, group_id, group_name, parent_group_id, '0', DOC_CNT, DOC_LEAD_TIME, STATS_DATE, SYSDATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT gp.portal_id, gp.GROUP_ID, gp.group_name, gp.parent_group_id, (SELECT COUNT (b.appr_id) FROM ikep4_appr_doc b WHERE b.appr_group_id IN ( SELECT X.GROUP_ID FROM ikep4_ev_group X WHERE X.group_type_id = 'G0001' START WITH X.GROUP_ID = gp.GROUP_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR X.GROUP_ID = X.PARENT_group_id) AND b.appr_doc_status = '2' AND TO_CHAR (b.appr_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_DATE (SYSDATE-1, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) DOC_CNT, (SELECT ROUND (SUM (b.appr_end_date - b.appr_req_date), 1) FROM ikep4_appr_doc b WHERE b.appr_group_id IN ( SELECT X.GROUP_ID FROM ikep4_ev_group X WHERE X.group_type_id = 'G0001' START WITH X.GROUP_ID = gp.GROUP_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR X.GROUP_ID = X.PARENT_group_id) AND b.appr_doc_status = '2' AND TO_CHAR (b.appr_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_DATE (SYSDATE-1, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) DOC_LEAD_TIME, TO_DATE (SYSDATE-1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') STATS_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM ikep4_appr_doc WHERE appr_doc_status = '2' AND TO_CHAR (appr_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_DATE (SYSDATE-1, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ap RIGHT JOIN ikep4_ev_group gp ON ap.appr_group_id = gp.GROUP_ID WHERE gp.GROUP_TYPE_ID = 'G0001' GROUP BY gp.portal_id, gp.GROUP_ID, gp.group_name, gp.PARENT_GROUP_ID, TO_CHAR (ap.appr_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') WHERE DOC_CNT > 0)

INSERT INTO IKEP4_APPR_USER_STATS (USER_STATS_ID, USER_STATS_TYPE, PORTAL_ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, DOC_CNT, DOC_LEAD_TIME, PRE3AVG_LEAD_TIME, STATS_DATE, REGIST_DATE) SELECT SEQ_IKEP4.NEXTVAL, '0', portal_id, approver_id, approver_name, DOC_CNT, DOC_LEAD_TIME, PRE3AVG_LEAD_TIME, STATS_DATE, SYSDATE FROM ( SELECT ad.portal_id, al.approver_id, al.approver_name, COUNT (ad.appr_id) DOC_CNT, ROUND ( SUM ( al.appr_date - DECODE (al2.appr_date, '', ad.appr_req_date, al2.appr_date)), 1) DOC_LEAD_TIME, ROUND ( AVG ( al.appr_date - DECODE (al2.appr_date, '', ad.appr_req_date, al2.appr_date)), 1) PRE3AVG_LEAD_TIME, TO_CHAR (al.appr_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') STATS_DATE FROM ikep4_appr_doc ad INNER JOIN ikep4_appr_line al ON ad.appr_id = al.appr_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ikep4_appr_line al2 ON ad.appr_id = al2.appr_id AND al.appr_order - 1 = al2.appr_order WHERE ad.appr_doc_status = '2' AND al.approver_type = '0' AND al.appr_date between TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd')-1 and TO_DATE (SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY ad.portal_id, al.approver_id, al.approver_name, TO_CHAR (al.appr_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

INSERT INTO IKEP4_APPR_FORM_STATS (FORM_STATS_ID, PORTAL_ID, FORM_ID, PARENT_FORM_ID, SYSTEM_ID, FORM_CNT, STATS_DATE, REGIST_DATE) SELECT SEQ_IKEP4.NEXTVAL, PORTAL_ID, FORM_ID, FORM_PARENT_ID, SYSTEM_ID, FORMCNT, STATS_DATE, SYSDATE FROM ( SELECT AD.PORTAL_ID, AD.FORM_ID, AF.FORM_PARENT_ID, AF.SYSTEM_ID , COUNT(AD.FORM_ID) FORMCNT , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AD.APPR_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS STATS_DATE FROM IKEP4_APPR_DOC AD INNER JOIN IKEP4_APPR_FORM AF ON AD.FORM_ID = AF.FORM_ID WHERE AD.APPR_DOC_STATUS = '2' AND TO_CHAR(AD.APPR_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY AD.PORTAL_ID, AD.FORM_ID, AF.FORM_PARENT_ID, AF.SYSTEM_ID, TO_CHAR(AD.APPR_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') )
